name: Flower
long_description: Flower is an open-source framework for training AI on distributed data using federated learning. Companies like Banking Circle, Nokia, Porsche, and Brave use Flower to easily improve their AI models on sensitive data that is distributed across organizational silos or user devices. Almost all AI today is based on centralized public data â€” a small fraction of the data we have; we believe that training on orders of magnitude more data will unlock the next leaps in AI.
